article_title: Target Joins Home Depot, Walmart, Others In Cutting Health Care For Part-Timers, Citing Obamacare

article_metadata.description: Target has become the latest high-profile retailer to get rid of healthcare coverage for part-time employees. Workers' rights advocates say this is part of a worrying trend set by Walmart and others.
article_metadata.author: Clare O'Connor
